title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The true Southwest Airlines reboot is almost here â€” and it may be just the beginning
items.description: Southwest's updated planes are already taking to the sky, ahead of the true reboot Jan. 27.

items.title: Last-minute strategies to earn Marriott Bonvoy elite status
items.description: By opening a credit card or booking a cash or award stay, you can earn Marriott elite qualifying nights by the end of the year to enjoy status in 2026...

items.title: Say it ain't so: Air Canada Aeroplan points will now expire (again)
items.description: Aeroplan had paused points expiration during the coronavirus pandemic, but says it will again be allowing points to expire.

items.title: Get Apple TV+ and Apple Music with your Chase Sapphire Reserve
items.description: Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders get complimentary Apple TV+ and Apple Music subscriptions. Here's what you need to know.

items.title: The best credit cards for a diversified reward strategy
items.description: Consider these options from one of TPG's credit card editors.
